title: Council Decision of 14 April 2014 appointing and replacing members of the Governing Board of the European Centre for the Development of Vocational Training
header:
17.4.2014 EN Official Journal of the European Union C 118/1
COUNCIL DECISION
of 14 April 2014
appointing and replacing members of the Governing Board of the European Centre for the Development of Vocational Training
2014/C 118/01
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to Council Regulation (EEC) No 337/75 of 10 February 1975 establishing the European Centre for the Development of Vocational Training, and in particular Article 4 thereof (1),
Having regard to the nomination submitted by the Croatian government,
Having regard to the nomination submitted by the Commission in the category of Employees’ representatives,
Whereas:
(1) By its Decision of 16 July 2012 (2), the Council appointed the members of the Governing Board of the European Centre for the Development of Vocational Training for the period from 18 September 2012 to 17 September 2015.
(2) The seat of the Croatian member had to be filled.
(3) A member’s seat is available for Spain on the Governing Board of the Centre in the category of Employees’ representatives.
(4) A member’s seat on the Governing Board of the Centre in the category of representatives of Employers’ organisations has become vacant for Latvia as a result of the resignation of Ms Marina SKLARA.
(5) A member’s seat on the Governing Board of the Centre in the category of representatives of Employers’ organisations had to be filled for Croatia.
(6) The members of the Governing Board of the aforementioned Centre should be appointed for the remainder of the current term of office, which expires on 17 September 2015,
main_body:
The following persons are hereby appointed as members of the Governing Board of the European Centre for the Development of Vocational Training for the remainder of the term of office, which runs until 17 September 2015:
GOVERNMENT REPRESENTATIVES:
CROATIA Ms Katarina GRGEC
REPRESENTATIVES OF EMPLOYEES’ ORGANISATIONS:
SPAIN Ms Yolanda PONCE
REPRESENTATIVES OF EMPLOYERS’ ORGANISATIONS:
LATVIA Ms Inga ŠīNA
CROATIA Mr Ivica ZELIĆ
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 14 April 2014.
For the Council
The President
A. TSAFTARIS
(1)  OJ L 39, 13.2.1975, p. 1.
(2)  OJ C 228, 31.7.2012, p. 3.
